name.baseName: Steam/hot water/other ; Type coal ; Layer burning furnace ; All sizes; NESPS2
蒸汽/热水/其它 ; 型煤 ; 层燃炉 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisSodium alkali method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management92.5

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisSodium alkali method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management92.5
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所述的型煤层燃炉采用煤炭，设计用于各种规模的操作中产生蒸汽、热水或其他应用。该工艺的主要工业应用是在需要蒸汽或热水的领域中进行能量生成，例如电力厂、制造设施和供暖系统。所描述的尾气管理技术被用来处理排放气体，特别是用于去除二氧化硫（SO₂）、烟尘和氮氧化物 (NOₓ) 排放。采用各种技术如湿式沉降、石灰石/石灰石脱硫湿法、氧化镁法、纳碱法、氨法和双碱法，具有不同程度的技术效率，以遵守环境标准并减少对空气质量的影响。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,四级代码4430文件，在完整版文件中第5426页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen oxidesis/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0
污染物指标氮氧化物的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氮氧化物
nan
源文件中描述为为型煤，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废气量
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/
污染物指标工业废气量的末端治理技术是/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为工业废气量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废气量
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasisWith terminal treatment technology
污染物指标工业废气量的末端治理技术是有末端治理。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为工业废气量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废气量

Pollutant indicator sulfur dioxide end-of-pipe treatment technology is /, its efficiency is 0. The original document describes the pollutant category as exhaust gas, the pollutant indicator is sulfur dioxide, here to match it to the LCAflow library of the flow that most closely matches the pollutant indicator, the pollutant indicator note for sulfur dioxide original description of the production coefficient of 14S (no sulfur fixing agent). Please modify the corresponding emission rate after calculating by yourself according to the note.
污染物指标二氧化硫的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为二氧化硫，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为二氧化硫原文描述的产污系数为 14S(无固硫剂)。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。

Pollutant indicators of sulfur dioxide end-of-pipe treatment technology is wet de-dusting method, the efficiency of which is 15, end-of-pipe treatment facilities actual operating rate (k value) calculation formula for K = desulfurization facilities annual operating hours / boiler annual operating hours. The original document describes the pollutant category as exhaust gas, the pollutant indicator for sulfur dioxide, here to match it to the LCAflow library face to face the most compatible flow, the pollutant indicator note for sulfur dioxide original description of the production coefficient of 14S (no sulfur fixing agent). Please modify the corresponding emission rate after calculating by yourself according to the note.
污染物指标二氧化硫的末端治理技术是湿法除尘法，其效率为15，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为K=脱硫设施年运行小时数/锅炉年运行小时数。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为二氧化硫，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为二氧化硫原文描述的产污系数为 14S(无固硫剂)。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。

The end-of-pipe treatment technology for sulfur dioxide is /, and its efficiency is 0. The original document describes the pollutant category as exhaust gas, and the pollutant indicator as sulfur dioxide, which is matched here to the most compatible stream in the LCAflow library, and the pollutant indicator note for sulfur dioxide is the production coefficient described in the original document is 7S (with added sulfur fixing agent 8). Please modify the corresponding emissions according to the note after self-calculation..The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 7S(添加固硫剂8)。Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.。.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 7S(添加固硫剂8). Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.
污染物指标二氧化硫的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为二氧化硫，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为二氧化硫原文描述的产污系数为 7S(添加固硫剂8)。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。

The end-of-pipe treatment technology for the pollutant indicator soot is /, and its efficiency is 0. The original document describes the pollutant category as exhaust gas, and the pollutant indicator as soot, and the matching work is carried out here to match it to the flow that is most compatible with the LCAflow library, and the production coefficient of the pollutant indicator remarked in the original document for the soot is 0.01 A. Please modify the corresponding emissions after self-calculation according to the remark..The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 0.01A。Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.。.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 0.01A. Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.
